typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		daily_count as integer,
		date as date,
		rate_14_day as double,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source2
source1 filter(continent=="Europe",
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Filter1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code,
		continent,
		population,
		indicator,
		daily_count,
		date,
		rate_14_day,
		source
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code,
		continent,
		population,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['death_count', 'none_death_count']),
	Count = sum(daily_count),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1, source2 lookup(Pivot1@country == source2@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sort(desc(Countdeath_count, true),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['output.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
